pages.text: Phase Boosters are special artifacts that Vagrants can create to speed up their evolution.$(br)$(#630000)These increase global Evolution Point gain. I will receive credit for the added points.

Phase Boosters are special artifacts that Vagrants can create to speed up their evolution.$(br)$(#630000)These increase Evolution Point gain I am responsible for. I will receive credit for the added points.

Phase Boosters are separated into four stages, akin to a Nexus-tier parasite. Each one requires two of the last stage to be crafted, and passively drains Experience from the Vagrant that has equipped it.$(br)$(#630000)This has its own slot in the Malleability Menu, opened with $(k:srpcotesia.mallmenu).
